name: Project Octate [demo]
description:
• Cross and stabilize the dimensions.
  • Gather voxel information of bosses from npcs
  • create voxel art of bosses unleashing them from the dark dimension
  • Escape mazes created when bosses are unleashed and trap them in the light dimension

Why demo?.. I'm still implementing the things under about... This is mostly a tech demo to get the feel of how it'll work.. I'll try to make an update of this asap though I will be asking $1 for download cause of how much work I'm putting into this and I'd like to get something back ;P

I still need to add music, bosses, and npcs, maybe a level editor ;D
